description: Convert markdown to JSX with ease for React and React-like projects. Super lightweight and highly configurable.

name: markdown-to-jsx

scripts.build: babel index.js --out-file index.cjs.js --source-maps && BABEL_ENV=esm babel index.js --out-file index.esm.js --source-maps
scripts.prepublish: in-publish && npm run build && npm run release || not-in-publish
